casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Robert MURA, Appellant. WD 81758 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: June 18, 2019 Casey Taylor, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Joshua Bachman, St. Joseph, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Three: Thomas H. Newton, P.J., Anthony Rex Gabbert, and Edward R. Ardini, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

A Buchanan County jury convicted Mr. Robert Mura of the class A misdemeanor of stealing, while acquitting him of robbery in the first degree and armed criminal action. He was sentenced to one year in the county jail with credit for time served. For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
